    • estimateSearchResults

      int estimateSearchResults(SearchQuery sq)
      estimates the number of results returned
      Parameters:
      sq - the search query
      Returns:
      the number of results returned by the query

    • getTotal

      int getTotal(org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key results)
      Returns the total number of results in the search
      Parameters:
      results - the key containing all the results
      Returns:
      the total number of results

    • search

      SearchResult search(SearchQuery sq, String version, LookupOption... options)
      A simple search that runs end to end, supports mutliple versions, runs on currentSearch only
      Parameters:
      sq - the search query
      version - the version to lookup the results from
      options - the options to be used to retrieve the text
      Returns:
      the results

    • searchKeys

      org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key searchKeys(SearchQuery sq)
      Searches uniquely for the keys, in order to do the passage lookup at a later stage
      Parameters:
      sq - the search query
      Returns:
      the key to all the results

    • retrieveResultsFromKeys

      SearchResult retrieveResultsFromKeys(SearchQuery sq, org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key results, String version, LookupOption... options)
      Given a key, the search results are retrieved
      Parameters:
      sq - the search query
      results - the results
      version - the version that is desired
      options - the list of options to apply to the search results text retrieved
      Returns:
      the results

    • rankAndTrimResults

      org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key rankAndTrimResults(SearchQuery sq, org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key results)
      Given a criteria and a set of results, calculates the proper page
      Parameters:
      sq - the search criteria
      results - the large number of keys
      Returns:
      a reduced set of keys matching the page size and the correct page number

    • getResultsFromTrimmedKeys

      SearchResult getResultsFromTrimmedKeys(SearchQuery sq, String[] versions, int total, org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key newResults, String optionsInString)
      Can be called if we have already trimmed down the key - used in multi-version searches
      Parameters:
      sq - the search criteria
      versions - the list of versions
      total - the total number of results
      newResults - the paged key
      options - the options to set when generating the HTML
      Returns:
      the passages

    • getResultsFromTrimmedKeys

      SearchResult getResultsFromTrimmedKeys(SearchQuery sq, String[] versions, int total, org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key newResults, LookupOption... options)

    • getIndexSearcher

      org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher getIndexSearcher(String version)
      Gets an lucene index searcher. NOTE: it is the responsibility of the calling method to ensure the Index does not get closed.
      Parameters:
      version - the version we are going to search.
      Returns:
      the index searcher
